org.esupportail.commons.services.i18n
Interface I18nService

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractI18nService, BundleCachingI18nServiceImpl, BundleI18nServiceImpl, BundlesCachingI18nServiceImpl, BundlesI18nServiceImpl
public interface I18nService
extends java.io.Serializable

The interface of i18n services. An i18n service is a layer to abstract resources bundles, that should never be accessed directly.
